title: Circadian expression patterns of nuclear receptors
summary: This interactive dataset is a Q-PCR based profile of the circadian expression patterns of nuclear receptors in 4 metabolically active tissues in the mouse: liver, skeletal muscle, brown adipose tissue and white adipose tissue
contributors: Yang X, Downes M, Yu R, Bookout AL, He W, Straume M, Mangelsdorf DJ and Evans RM
